effect_entries.effect:
Used by a trainer in battle
:   Attempts to catch a wild Pokémon.  If used in a trainer battle, nothing happens and the ball is lost.

    If the trainer’s Pokémon and wild Pokémon are of the same species but opposite genders, the wild Pokémon’s catch rate is 8× normal.
effect_entries.short_effect: 8× effectiveness on opposite sex, same species targets of the Active Pokémon. Made from Pnk Apricorn.

flavor_text_entries.text: A Poké Ball that works best when catching a Pokémon that is of the opposite gender of your Pokémon.
